protocol_name: Re-amplification of CRISPRa and CRISPRi libraries (v1.0)Reference: Genome-Scale CRISPR-Mediated Control of Gene Repression and A
protocol_name_html: Re-amplification of CRISPRa and CRISPRi libraries (v1.0)Reference: Genome-Scale CRISPR-Mediated Control of Gene Repression and A

components.data: Dilute each sub-library to 50 ng/ul in water or EB
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dilute each sub-library to 50 ng/ul in water or EB

components.data:
Electroporate the library a	Pre-chill 01 cm cuvettes, megaX cells, 10% glycerol on ice
b	Follow the table above for the amounts of sub-library plasmid DNA and MegaX competent cells, mix gently and incubate on ice for 30 min
c	Add pre-chilled 10% glycerol to the MageX-library mix for a final 75 ul, transfer the mix to a prechilled 01 cm cuvette
d	Electroporate at 20 kV, 200 ohms, 25 uF (Gene Pulser Xcell, Bio-rad)
e	Transfer cells to a culture tube
i	Use 1 ml pipettes and gel loading tips
ii	Wash cells out gently with 300 ul SOC twice (total 600 ul)	
f	Incubate at 37oC, 250 rpm, 15 hour
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Electroporate the library a	Pre-chill 01 cm cuvettes, megaX cells, 10% glycerol on ice
b	Follow the table above for the amounts of sub-library plasmid DNA and MegaX competent cells, mix gently and incubate on ice for 30 min
c	Add pre-chilled 10% glycerol to the MageX-library mix for a final 75 ul, transfer the mix to a prechilled 01 cm cuvette
d	Electroporate at 20 kV, 200 ohms, 25 uF (Gene Pulser Xcell, Bio-rad)
e	Transfer cells to a culture tube
i	Use 1 ml pipettes and gel loading tips
ii	Wash cells out gently with 300 ul SOC twice (total 600 ul)	
f	Incubate at 37oC, 250 rpm, 15 hour

components.data:
Plate the transformations a	Plate all in one large square plate per sub-library, use autoclaved beads
b	Incubate at 37oC for 18 hours
components.name: Description

source_data.description:
Plate the transformations a	Plate all in one large square plate per sub-library, use autoclaved beads
b	Incubate at 37oC for 18 hours

components.data: Collect all colonies with LB and do one maxiprep per plate, elute in 500 ul EB; an ideal concentration is about 2~3 ug/ul
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Collect all colonies with LB and do one maxiprep per plate, elute in 500 ul EB; an ideal concentration is about 2~3 ug/ul

components.data:
To sequence the library, you can PCR the sgRNA region with the following primers (a common 3’ primer, with 2 different 5’ primers for CRISPRa or CRISPRi)
•	CRISPRi TSS common 3' caagcagaagacggcatacgaCGACTCGGTGCCACTTTTTC
•	oCRISPRi TSS_1 (TruSeq Index 12 CTTGTA), aatgatacggcgaccaccgaGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCACCTTGTAgcacaaaaggaaactcaccct
•	oCRISPRi TSS_2 (TruSeq Index 6 GCCAAT) aatgatacggcgaccaccgaGATCGGAAGAGCACACGTCTGAACTCCAGTCACGCCAATgcacaaaaggaaactcaccct

a	Pool sub-libraries proportionally (based on the number of sgRNAs) to have the CRISPRa or CRISPRi library, measure the pooled concentration and dilute it to 400 ng/ul for PCR
b	Run 3 tubes of 100 ul PCR reactions
components.name: Description

a	Pool sub-libraries proportionally (based on the number of sgRNAs) to have the CRISPRa or CRISPRi library, measure the pooled concentration and dilute it to 400 ng/ul for PCR
b	Run 3 tubes of 100 ul PCR reactions

components.data:
library 400ng/ul 1
5x Q5 BUFFER 20
5X GC BUFFER 20
dNTPs 10mM 2
Index primer 10uM 2.5
Common Primer 10uM 2.5
Q5 Hotstart polymerase 1
ddH2O 51
